description:
Tsukuyomi Shirabe is one of the mysterious warriors who fights alongside Maria. Contrary to her quiet looks, Shirabe is a calculating girl who will use whatever means necessary to achieve her goal. She holds a great distrust toward Hibiki, who is called a hero who saved the world from a shard of the moon, and calls her words "hypocrisy".
Source: ANN
name: Tsukuyomi Shirabe
